1100001001110101 1001000110000010 1 -> sum: 0101001111111000, cout: 1
0111111110000010 0010100110011001 1 -> sum: 1010100100011100, cout: 0
1000110000100001 0010101100110000 0 -> sum: 1011011101010001, cout: 0
0001000110000000 0110100000000001 0 -> sum: 0111100110000001, cout: 0
0000101000000010 1000100010110110 1 -> sum: 1001001010111001, cout: 0
0111010001100001 0010001110000100 0 -> sum: 1001011111100101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
